info.speedDesc: Take a quick typing test and instantly see your WPM, accuracy, and percentile ranking among typists worldwide.
info.trackDesc: Earn XP, level up through 10 ranks, unlock achievements, and maintain daily streaks as you improve.
info.langDesc: Practice in English, Korean, Chinese, Japanese, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, or Russian.
info.tip1: Focus on accuracy first — speed follows naturally once you build muscle memory. Aim for 95%+ accuracy.
info.tip2: Use proper home row placement (ASDF JKL;) and reach for keys without looking at the keyboard.
info.tip3: Practice 10–15 minutes daily. Short, consistent sessions beat occasional long ones.
info.tip4: Use the keyboard heatmap and weak key lessons to target your specific problem areas.
info.benchmarkNote: The average office worker types around 40 WPM. With regular practice on DuckType, most people reach 80+ WPM within a few months.
info.howWpmDesc: WPM (Words Per Minute) is the standard measure of typing speed. Each "word" is standardized to 5 characters including spaces, ensuring fair comparison across languages and word lengths.
info.improveDesc: Try our structured typing lessons or practice your weak keys to boost your speed and accuracy.

v230.title: Adventure Mode Visual Upgrade
v230.item1: Custom Player Sprite — The player duck now uses a hand-drawn character image instead of an emoji.
v230.item2: New Monster Names — World 1 monsters have been renamed with unique personalities (Speedy Fox, Pumba, Rascal Raccoon, and more).
v230.item3: Combat Animations — Player bounces on wave clear and glows with a purple poison aura in World 2.

v220.title: Profile WPM Trend Chart
v220.item1: WPM Trend Chart — See how your typing speed has changed over your recent tests with a line chart on your profile page.

v211.title: Adventure Mode Mobile Optimization
v211.item1: Mobile Combat Layout — Compact HUD and reduced padding during combat for maximum game field visibility on mobile.
v211.item2: Virtual Keyboard Auto-Scroll — Input field automatically scrolls into view when the virtual keyboard opens.
v211.item3: Combat Header Auto-Hide — Header and footer automatically hide during adventure combat to maximize screen space.

v210.title: Daily Boost & Smart Keyboard Detection
v210.item1: Daily XP Boost (1.5x) — Complete the daily challenge to earn 1.5x XP on all tests for the rest of the day! Start your day right.
v210.item2: Keyboard Mismatch Warning — Automatically detects when your input method doesn't match the test language and shows a helpful reminder to switch.

v200.title: Adventure Mode — Typing RPG is here!
v200.item1: World 1: Duck Village — 8 stages + Shadow Wolf boss. Defend the village with the power of typing!
v200.item2: World 2: Venom Jungle — 9 stages + Giant Viper boss. Survive the poison that drains your HP every second!
v200.item3: 3 Difficulty Tiers — Beginner, Intermediate, Expert. Each cleared difficulty earns more stars and XP.
v200.item4: Boss Death Animation — Bosses shake, shatter and scream "QUACK!!" when defeated, with cinematic victory scenes.
v200.item5: Cinematic Endings — Unique story cinematics after each world boss. "Peace has returned to Duck Village..."
v200.item6: Difficulty Progression — Beat the boss to unlock the next difficulty tier. Master all 3 to fully conquer each world!
v200.item7: Share Your Victories — Share your adventure results with friends on X, KakaoTalk, WhatsApp, and more. Earn +35 XP daily!
